greywrap.description_1: I work with the lastest and best technology for the web. I use Ruby on Rails for the Backend, Javascript for the Frontend and C#/Unity for game developement and virtual reality.
greywrap.description_2: We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them. Here is that diferent kind of thinking.
greywrap.description_3: The beauty is in the balance of things. And in the balance between creative design and functionality create beautiful solutions that you will love to use

about.about_description_1: I graduated as an Electrical Engineer and I have been programming since BASIC and MS DOS. After many years of experience and used technologies I prefer to use Ruby on Rails and Javascript for web development. C# and Unity for Virtual Reality and Game Development. Apart from programming I am passionate about drawing and painting.
about.about_description_2: Papaya Labs is my workspace, I usually do freelance alone but sometimes I collaborate in this space with other programmers and designers to build a project. If you want to know more about my work history you can download my CV in spanish here or in english here or connect with me in Linkedin here . Also you can hire me throught Upwork here

divider_2.divider_title: I LIKE TO CREATE COOL STUFF

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.description_1: Exhibio Virtual Component ® is unity prefab component that enable to display a Virtual exhibition gallery in an 3D model room. It has integrated the instructions, information of the exhibition, automatic tour, fullscreen and send message functionalities.
portfolio.description_2: Pymenta is a very simple Cloud ERP System designed to work in the cloud and allow small companies to create, manage and print documents ( invoices, notes, quotations, credits, etc). You can manage warehouses, providers, clients, products and stock.
